note: Born and raised in Minneapolis, MN, K Quo has been honing his musical skills since the tender age of 12. He is a talented producer, singer/songwriter and rapper, with an emerging interest in graphic design and videography. With his proficiency in MACHINE and Logic Pro, K Quo is a well-rounded audio engineer. Influenced by musical legends such as Kanye West, Prince, Lil Wayne, Eminem and J.
